data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About DocumentLibrary Module

DocumentLibrary allows users to manage and share documents in a flexible, intelligent way, offering granular control over Folder and Document access.

data.name: CategoryParentHelp.Text
data.value: Select the parent category for the current category

data.name: CategoryDirectUrlHelp.Text
data.value:
If linking to this page through an external link, and you only want to show the contents of this specific category (and all of its sub-categories), use the following URL.

This URL will achieve the same results as setting the value of 'Restrict List to 1 Category' in the module settings.

data.name: CategoryNameHelp.Text
data.value: Enter a name for the category

data.name: FolderNameHelp.Text
data.value: Enter a name for the Folder

data.name: FolderParentHelp.Text
data.value: Select the parent folder for the current folder.

data.name: FolderDirectUrlHelp.Text
data.value:
If linking to this page through an external link, and you only want to show the contents of this specific folder (and all of its sub-folders), use the following URL.

This URL will achieve the same results as setting the value of 'Restrict List to 1 Folder' in the module settings.

data.name: DocumentCategoriesHelp.Text
data.value: Select the categories you want to associate with the document

data.name: DocumentNameHelp.Text
data.value: Enter a name for the document

data.name: DocumentDescriptionHelp.Text
data.value: Enter a description for the document

data.name: DocumentFolderHelp.Text
data.value: Select a folder to store the document

data.name: DocumentFileHelp.Text
data.value: Select a file from your file system

data.name: DocumentUnzipHelp.Text
data.value: Select this option to unzip the uploaded file and create the corresponding folder structure. After unzipping the uploaded zip file, it will be removed.

data.name: DocumentOverwriteHelp.Text
data.value: Select this option to ovewrite existing files

data.name: hlpSecurity.Help
data.value: Set security rights on folders and/or documents for every role.

data.name: SecurityInheritHelp.Text
data.value: Select this option if you want this folder to inherit security permission from parent folder

data.name: FolderDirectViewHelp.Text
data.value:
Select this option if you want this folder to be hidden from general view, unless accessed directly through the 'Direct URL' parameter provided above or through settings the value of 'Restrict List to 1 Folder' in the module settings.

If the folder marked for direct view contains children, all children will also be visible, unless those children have also been marked for direct view.

[parameter name and value: fid=nn]

data.name: CategoryDirectViewHelp.Text
data.value:
Select this option if you want this category to be hidden from general view, unless accessed directly through the 'Category Direct URL' parameter provided above or through settings the value of 'Restrict List to 1 Category' in the module settings.

[parameter name and value: cid=nn]

data.name: treeNoRootFolderInfo.Text
data.value:
There is no root folder defined.
The following options are availabe in order to create one:
  • you can create a new folder by clicking on the [click to add root folder] link in the navigation tree
  • you can select a pre-existing folder by navigating to the settings of this module and in the global tab, selecting the Portal option and then a [Root Folder] from the list, or selecting the UNC Share option, and then typing the path of the folder.

    Note: either selection will will automatically synchronize the database with the folder. All documents and child-folders in the new root folder will be included in the library.

data.name: fileExists.Text
data.value: File already exists. To override check 'Overwrite Existing File(s)' box.

data.name: deleteDocConfirm.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this Document?

data.name: deleteFolderConfirm.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this Folder and all of its Documents and SubFolders?

data.name: lblDownload.Text
data.value:
You are about to download a file from this site.

Click on the download button to start downloading.

data.name: errorSelfPointingChild.Text
data.value: Error updating the folder. Cause: the parent folder selected is the current folder

data.name: errorUnauthorizedParentFolder.Text
data.value: Error updating the folder. Cause: you do not have enough permissions to move this folder under the selected parent folder

data.name: errorUnauthorizedParentCategory.Text
data.value: Error updating the category. Cause: you do not have enough permissions to move this category under the selected parent category

data.name: errorExistingFolder.Text
data.value: Error updating the folder. Cause: this folder name already exists

data.name: errorExistingFolderDirectKey.Text
data.value: Error updating the folder. Cause: this folder's direct key already exists, and it must be unique.

data.name: errorExistingCategoryDirectKey.Text
data.value: Error updating the category. Cause: this category's direct key already exists, and it must be unique.

data.name: errorParentAlreadyChild.Text
data.value: Error updating the folder. Cause: the parent folder selected is a child folder

data.name: errorRequiredFolder.Text
data.value: Error creating the folder. Cause: a folder name is required.

data.name: treeFolderDirectView.Help
data.value: The navigation tree contains folders that have been configured to be hidden from non administrator view, unless accessed directly through the 'Direct URL' parameter in the edit folder section or through settings the value of 'Restrict List to 1 Folder' in the module settings

data.name: treeCategoryDirectView.Help
data.value: The navigation tree contains categories that have been configured to be hidden from non administrator view, unless accessed directly through the 'Category Direct URL' parameter in the edit category section or through settings the value of 'Restrict List to 1 Folder' in the module settings

data.name: treeFolderRestricted.Help
data.value: The module has been configured to show only subfolders and documents from one folder.

data.name: treeCategoryRestricted.Help
data.value: The module has been configured to show only subcategories and documents from one category.

data.name: treeHidden.Help
data.value: The module has been configured to hide the list tree to non administrator users.

data.name: treeToggle.Help
data.value: The module has been configured not to allow toggling between folder and category mode to non administrator users.

data.name: treeFolderRequiredAdmin.Text
data.value: the current settings require a folder to be specified either through settings or through url parameters

data.name: treeFolderRequiredUser.Text
data.value: the current settings do not allow direct access to this document library

data.name: treeCategoryRequiredAdmin.Text
data.value: the current settings require a category to be specified either through settings or through url parameters

data.name: treeCategoryRequiredUser.Text
data.value: the current settings do not allow direct access to this document library

data.name: treeFolderRequiredValid.Text
data.value: the specified folder does not exist

data.name: treeCategoryRequiredValid.Text
data.value: the specified category does not exist

data.name: errorCategorySelfPointingChild.Text
data.value: Error updating the category. Cause: The parent category selected is the current category

data.name: errorExistingCategory.Text
data.value: Error updating the category. Cause: This category name already exists

data.name: errorCategoryParentAlreadyChild.Text
data.value: Error updating the category. Cause: The parent category selected is a child category

data.name: deleteCategoryConfirm.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this Category and all of its SubCategories?

data.name: plModuleStyle.Help
data.value: Select the Style of the module

data.name: hlpFolderDirectAccess.Help
data.value: This group of attributes determines if and how a folder can be accessed directly through a URL

data.name: FolderDirectKeyHelp.Text
data.value:
If you want to key protect this folder, enter a unique key. In order to access the folder, the key will be a required parameter in the URL.

[parameter name and value: fk=nn]

data.name: hlpCategoryDirectAccess.Help
data.value: This group of attributes determines if and how a folder can be accessed directly through a url

data.name: CategoryDirectKeyHelp.Text
data.value:
If you want to key protect this category, enter a unique key. In order to access the folder, the key will be a required parameter in the URL.

[parameter name and value: ck=nn]

data.name: SecurityUserHelp.Text
data.value: Set security rights on folders and/or documents for every user.

data.name: lblSecurityUserEdit.Text
data.value: [to add user security, add the folder first]

data.name: DocumentVersionsHelp.Text
data.value: View version information for this document.

data.name: cmdDocVerAdd.AlternateText
data.value: save this document as a new version

data.name: cmdRestore.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to restore this item?

data.name: cmdDestroy.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this item permanently?

data.name: errorRestoreNoVersionDoc.Text
data.value: Error restoring the item. Cause: no version to restore

data.name: errorRestoreNoActiveDoc.Text
data.value: Error restoring the item. Cause: no active document exists for this document version.

data.name: alertRestoreSuccess.Text
data.value: Success. This item has been restored succesfully.

data.name: errorDestroyNoVersionDoc.Text
data.value: Error deleting the item. Cause: no version to delete

data.name: alertDestroySuccess.Text
data.value: Success. This item has been deleted succesfully.

data.name: warningAsyncSyncAdmin.Text
data.value:
A file synchronization process is still running.

As a consequence, you may not be seeing the most up to date information until the process has completed.

To see the status of the synchronization process, please go to the module settings and under the globals tab, click on the Synchronization Log icon.

data.name: warningAsyncSync.Text
data.value: a file synchronization process is running. Not all data may be up to date.

data.name: errorRootFolderAdmin.Text
data.value:
Error while updating the Root Folder.
No changes were made.

Possible Causes:
  • The ASP.NET/Network Services user, does not have appropriate permissions on the directory you are trying to seet as the Root Folder
  • The Directory Path is incorrect

data.name: errorRootFolder.Text
data.value: error while updating the Root Folder. No changes were made.

data.name: DocumentUploadedHelp.Text
data.value: Upload Information includes: Upload Date, User Login Name, User Full Name

data.name: DocumentModifiedHelp.Text
data.value: Modified Information includes: Modified Date, User Login Name, User Full Name

data.name: errorAddExtension.Text
data.value: current settings (module or host) do not allow this file extension

data.name: errorDownloadFileDoc.Text
data.value: Error while downloading this file. Cause: The file with id:{0} does not exist in the database.

data.name: errorDownloadFileSec.Text
data.value: Error while downloading this file. Cause: Appropriate security credentials missing.

data.name: cmdTrack.Text
data.value: currently tracking. click to turn off [at folder level]

data.name: cmdTrackNo.Text
data.value: not tracking. click to turn on [at folder level]

data.name: cmdTrackNoLogin.Text
data.value: tracking [for the whole folder] enabled for logged in users

data.name: trackBody.Text
data.value: The following document(s) have changed on site {0}: {1}

data.name: folderModerateNoUnzip.Text
data.value: Cannot unzip a file in a moderated folder. If needed, please upload files in the .zip package individually.

data.name: uploadModerateFolConfirm.Text
data.value: Moderated folder upload. All uploaded documents will be reviewed before being published.

data.name: updateDocConfirm.Text
data.value: Moderated folder edit. All edits will be reviewed before being published.

data.name: moderateBody.Text
data.value: The following document(s) need moderation on site {0}: {1}

data.name: hlpDocumentImage.Help
data.value: Enter the URL of the image associated with the document

data.name: trackFolderOnConfirm.Text
data.value: You are about to enable document tracking on the entire folder.\nYou will be notified of changes to all existing items, as well as new item uploads.

data.name: trackFolderOffConfirm.Text
data.value: You are about to disable document tracking on the entire folder.\nYou will be no longer receive notification on any item changes or uploads.

data.name: cmdTrackDoc.Text
data.value: currently tracking. click to turn off

data.name: cmdTrackDocNo.Text
data.value: not tracking. click to turn on

data.name: cmdTrackDocNoLogin.Text
data.value: tracking enabled for logged in users

data.name: UploadProgressHelp.Text
data.value: Huge files could take a long time to upload so please be patient.

data.name: fileBeingModerated.Text
data.value: File being moderated. While a document is being reviewed, it cannot be overwritten.

data.name: errorActiveXSettings.Text
data.value: error: ActiveX settings do not seem to be properly enabled.

data.name: DocumentDateExpirationHelp.Text
data.value: Enter a expiration date for the document

data.name: lblExpirationDateCleared.Text
data.value: The expiration date has been cleared

data.name: RoleSecurityHelp.Text
data.value: Set security rights on folders and/or documents for every role.
